pageContext.title: Visual Accent and Dialect Archive (VADA)
pageContext.description_excerpt: The Visual Accent & Dialect Archive (VADA) is an archive of video clips from around the world, providing both aural and visual information about a dialect or accent. Other academic speech/accent libraries and archives on the web offer only the aural aspect of learning an accent.
pageContext.participants: Amanda Visconti, Dave Lester, Elisabeth Kvernen, James Smith, Kirsten Keister, Leigh Smiley
